owner_summaries.key_concerns: Entity-level TB balances not zero, high flux analysis exceptions

residual_risks.description: Entity-level trial balance discrepancies could lead to misstated financials.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated reconciliation tools and increase frequency of reviews.

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicates potential operational inefficiencies.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Conduct root cause analysis and enhance variance analysis procedures.
